title: Your News
whiteLabeledText: This course is brought to you thanks to our parnership with this university
free-trial-msg: You are currently on a free trial, some features might be limited. Upgrade your plan to have unlimited access!

join-cohort-page.cta-description: Your current plan does not include access to this cohort, please upgrade to access the content.
join-cohort-page.cta-cohort-not-found: This cohort does not exist or you don't have access to join.
join-cohort-page.join-more: Join more than 100 people taking this course right now
join-cohort-page.preview-description: You are reviewing this cohort dashboard on "preview mode", in order to start learning and interact with the materials please join the cohort.

already-have-this-cohort: You are already a member of this cohort

modules.target-blank-msg: "{{title}}" will open the following URL on a new window
modules.search-not-found: No matches found for this search

newActivities.title: Hey! There are {{tasksLength}} new activities for this day

modules.start-message: You have not started this module
modules.no-activities: The module doesn't have any lessons, exercises, or projects

cohortSideBar.title: About your cohort
cohortSideBar.no-teachers: This cohort does not have any teachers yet
cohortSideBar.no-assistant: This cohort does not have any assistants yet
cohortSideBar.no-students: This cohort does not have any students yet
cohortSideBar.no-active-students: This cohort does not have any active students yet
cohortSideBar.no-graduated-students: This cohort does not have any graduates yet

supportSideBar.title: Don't Get Stuck
supportSideBar.description: Did you know you can schedule mentoring sessions at any time or ask in the Support Chat?
supportSideBar.no-mentor-link: No link to create session with this mentor
supportSideBar.start-mentorship: To get started, select a mentorship type

mentorship.no-mentorship: You have ran out of mentorships, but don't worry, you can get more in a few clicks.

deliverProject.title: Deliver assignment
deliverProject.how-to-deliver-text: Please submit a Github URL that points to your project as a Github repository. How to deliver projects
deliverProject.mandatory-message: You have {{count}} mandatory projects to complete before graduation.
deliverProject.file-upload: Upload one or more files with no more than 10MB in the following formats:
deliverProject.error-file-size: File size must be less than 10mb.
deliverProject.invalid-url: Invalid URL, expected link must contain: {{url}}
deliverProject.no-delivery-needed: To deliver this assignment you are not required to upload or specify anything, just click on the button below "Deliver assignment" and it will be considered done.

mandatoryProjects.title: Pending mandatory projects
mandatoryProjects.description: You have pending mandatory subjects, you have to finish them in order to complete the course.

modalInfo.title: Review status
modalInfo.still-reviewing: Your teacher is still reviewing your delivery and will provide feedback once it's done
modalInfo.reviewed: Your teacher has reviewed your delivery and has provided feedback
modalInfo.approved: Your teacher has successfully approved your project!

rejected.title: Your teacher has rejected your project

non-github-url.title: non-Github URL detected
non-github-url.description: Usually projects are delivered through Github, are you sure you want to submit a non-Github URL?

warningModal.title: synchronize with Github
warningModal.sub-title: Your Github account is not connected
warningModal.text: 4Geeks is seamlessly integrated with Github for an optimal learning experience, we strongly recommend connecting your GitHub account.
warningModal.text2: Github hosts 90% of the world's code and it has become one of the most important assets for tech professionals. Click here to learn more about why and how we use your Github credentials.

unsynced.title: There are {{taskLength}} unsynced cohort tasks
unsynced.description: These tasks may be deleted and lost in the future. Make sure to sync them if you don't want to lose them.
unsynced.reject-unsync-title: Please confirm your action to reject all unsynced tasks

attendance-modal.select-students: Select the students in the class
attendance-modal.showing-students-with-active-educational: Only showing students with active educational status
attendance-modal.attendance-taken-table-message: This information is displayed based on the last assistance issued on the selected day, with the date issued in UTC time.

attendance-already-taken.title: Modify attendance?
attendance-already-taken.description: The attendance for this day has already been taken. Are you sure you want to modify it?

warn-slower-teaching.title: Delayed module start
warn-slower-teaching.description: Are you sure you want to start teaching {{module}}? You are about to teach the current module for {{repeated}} days and the suggested duration is {{expected}} days.

teacher-sidebar.no-instructions: >:warning: No available instruction found for this module

welcome-modal.title: Welcome to 4Geeks!
welcome-modal.description: Watch this short video that explains how to get the most out of 4Geeks and enhance your learning experience
